bwwExcerpt: Olivia Valli as "Vivian" has a great voice and an expressive face that draws you in. Fun Fact: Olivia is the granddaughter of Franki Valli, whose falsetto singing voice was the signature sound of The Four Seasons celebrated in the musical JERSEY BOYS which also played at Shea's. What's more, in an off-Broadway production, Olivia actually played her grandmother!
